trans-unit.source: (Note we must use gt instead of the native > operator in JavaScript, for the same reason. In Python the > operator is overloaded to be translated to ReQL’s gt command, a trick that is not possible in JavaScript.)
trans-unit.target: （请注意，出于相同的原因，我们必须在JavaScript中使用 gt 而不是native > 运算符。在Python中， > 运算符会被重载以转换为ReQL的 gt 命令，这是JavaScript中无法实现的技巧。）

trans-unit.source: (This may happen, for instance, between v1.13 and v1.14, when the internal format of secondary indexes changed.) Outdated indexes can still be used—they don’t affect availability. However, you should rebuild your index before updating to the next version of RethinkDB.
trans-unit.target: （例如，在二级索引的内部格式发生更改时，可能会在v1.13和v1.14之间发生这种情况。）过时的索引仍然可以使用，它们不会影响可用性。但是，您应该在更新到下一版本的RethinkDB之前重建索引。

trans-unit.source: (Those are the bottom 10 of the top 250, so they’re still pretty good.)
trans-unit.target: （这些是前250名中的前10名，因此它们仍然不错。）

trans-unit.source: (We also use the technique for renaming a field, described above, to give the names “reduction” and “group” more useful names of “invoices” and “month.”) You could use any combination of the ReQL date/time interval commands in the group, or work with the date/time as a native object.
trans-unit.target: （我们还使用上述重命名字段的技术，为名称“ reduction”和“ group”赋予了“发票”和“ month”更有用的名称。）您可以使用ReQL日期/时间间隔的任意组合组中的命令，或将日期/时间作为本机对象使用。

trans-unit.target: （您也可以在配置文件中指定 bind-http= 。）

trans-unit.target: （您必须指定要从中还原的存档；没有默认值。）

trans-unit.source: Map-reduce is a way to summarize and run aggregation functions on large data sets, potentially stored across many servers, in an efficient fashion. It works by processing the data on each server in parallel and then combining those results into one set. It was originally designed by Google and later implemented in database systems such as Apache Hadoop and MongoDB.
trans-unit.target: Map-reduce是一种对大型数据集进行汇总和运行聚合功能的方法，该数据集可能以高效的方式存储在许多服务器上。它通过并行处理每个服务器上的数据，然后将这些结果组合为一组来工作。它最初由Google设计，后来在诸如Apache Hadoop和MongoDB的数据库系统中实现。

trans-unit.target: Celery的RethinkDB的自定义结果后端。

trans-unit.source: Elasticsearch is a database that stores documents in a crafty way that makes it fast to search large fields of pure text. For instance, it indexes words in different ways depending on how frequent they are in your overall data. It doesn’t waste time checking common words like “is” and “to” when returning results unless they actually make a difference. It also performs stemming, so that a search for “looked” will return results containing the words “looks” and “looking.”
trans-unit.target: Elasticsearch是一个以狡猾的方式存储文档的数据库，可以快速搜索大型纯文本字段。例如，它根据总数据中的频率以不同的方式为单词建立索引。除非返回结果确实有所不同，否则在返回结果时检查“ is”和“ to”等常用词不会浪费时间。它还执行词干分析，以便搜索“ looked”将返回包含单词“ looks”和“ looking”的结果。

trans-unit.source: "always": behave as true, but include all documents the command tried to update whether or not the update was successful. (This was the behavior of true pre-2.0.)
trans-unit.target: "always" ：表现为 true ，但是包括命令尝试更新的所有文档，无论更新是否成功。（这是 true pre-2.0 的行为。）

trans-unit.source: "error": Do not insert the new document and record the conflict as an error. This is the default.
trans-unit.target: "error" ：请勿插入新文档，并将冲突记录为错误。这是默认值。

trans-unit.source: "field_name": a string will be taken as the name of a field to perform a merge-sort on. The input sequences must be ordered before being passed to union.
trans-unit.target: "field_name" ：将字符串作为执行合并排序的字段的名称。输入序列在传递给 union 之前必须先进行排序。

trans-unit.source: "replace": Replace the old document in its entirety with the new one.
trans-unit.target: "replace" ：用新文档完全替换旧文档。

trans-unit.source: "update": Update fields of the old document with fields from the new one.
trans-unit.target: "update" ：使用新文档中的字段更新旧文档中的字段。

trans-unit.source: <arguments> is a list of all arguments. Each argument is itself a query (a command list, or data).
trans-unit.target: <arguments> 是所有参数的列表。每个参数本身就是一个查询（命令列表或数据）。

trans-unit.source: <command> is the integer representing the command, from ql2.proto
trans-unit.target: <command> 是表示命令的整数，来自 ql2.proto

trans-unit.source: <options> are the command’s optional arguments. This element may be left out if the command has no optional arguments given.
trans-unit.target: <options> 是命令的可选参数。如果命令未提供可选参数，则可以忽略此元素。

trans-unit.source: 'majority' will only return values that are safely committed on disk on a majority of replicas. This requires sending a message to every replica on each read, so it is the slowest but most consistent.
trans-unit.target: 'majority' 将仅返回在大多数副本上磁盘上已安全提交的值。这需要在每次读取时向每个副本发送一条消息，因此它是最慢但最一致的。

trans-unit.source: 'outdated' will return values that are in memory on an arbitrarily-selected replica. This is the fastest but least consistent.
trans-unit.target: 'outdated' 将返回在任意选择的副本上的内存中的值。这是最快但最不稳定的。

trans-unit.source: 'single' (the default) returns values that are in memory (but not necessarily written to disk) on the primary replica.
trans-unit.target: 'single' （默认）返​​回主副本上内存中的值（但不一定写入磁盘）。

trans-unit.source: *_port: the RethinkDB ports on that server (from the server’s own point of view).
trans-unit.target: *_port ：该服务器上的RethinkDB端口（从服务器本身的角度来看）。

trans-unit.source: --bind {all | addr}: add the address of a local interface to listen on when accepting connections; loopback addresses are enabled by default
trans-unit.target: --bind {all | addr} ：添加一个本地接口的地址以在接受连接时监听；默认情况下启用环回地址

trans-unit.source: --bind-cluster {all | addr}: bind the cluster connection port to a specific address
trans-unit.target: --bind-cluster {all | addr} ：将集群连接端口绑定到特定地址

trans-unit.source: --bind-driver {all | addr}: bind the client driver to a specific address
trans-unit.target: --bind-driver {all | addr} ：将客户端驱动程序绑定到特定地址

trans-unit.source: --bind-http {all | addr}: bind the web administration UI port to a specific address
trans-unit.target: --bind-http {all | addr} ：将Web管理UI端口绑定到特定地址

trans-unit.source: --cache-size mb: total cache size (in megabytes) for the process. Can be ‘auto’.
trans-unit.target: --cache-size mb ：该进程的总缓存大小（以兆字节为单位）。可以是“自动”。

trans-unit.source: --canonical-address addr: address that other RethinkDB instances will use to connect to us, can be specified multiple times
trans-unit.target: --canonical-address addr ：其他RethinkDB实例将用于连接到我们的地址，可以多次指定

trans-unit.source: --clients: number of client connections to use (default: 8)
trans-unit.target: --clients ：要使用的客户端连接数（默认值： 8 ）

trans-unit.source: --clients: number of tables to export simultaneously (default: 3)
trans-unit.target: --clients ：要同时导出的表数（默认值： 3 ）

trans-unit.source: --clients: the number of client connections to use at once (default 8)
trans-unit.target: --clients ：一次使用的客户端连接数（默认为8）

trans-unit.source: --cluster-port port: port for receiving connections from other nodes
trans-unit.target: --cluster-port port ：用于接收来自其他节点的连接的端口

trans-unit.source: --cluster-reconnect-timeout secs: the amount of time, in seconds, this server will try to reconnect to a cluster if it loses connection before giving up; default 86400
trans-unit.target: --cluster-reconnect-timeout secs ：如果服务器在放弃之前失去连接，将尝试重新连接到集群的时间（以秒为单位）；默认 86400

trans-unit.source: --cluster-tls-ca ca_filename: CA certificate bundle used to verify cluster peer certificates
trans-unit.target: --cluster-tls-ca ca_filename ：用于验证集群对等证书的CA证书包

trans-unit.source: --cluster-tls-cert cert_filename: certificate to use for intra-cluster connection TLS
trans-unit.target: --cluster-tls-cert cert_filename ：用于集群内连接TLS的证书

trans-unit.source: --cluster-tls-key key_filename: private key to use for intra-cluster connection TLS
trans-unit.target: --cluster-tls-key key_filename ：用于集群内连接TLS的私钥

trans-unit.source: --config-file: take options from a configuration file
trans-unit.target: --config-file ：从配置文件中获取选项

trans-unit.source: --custom-header: supply a custom header row for a CSV file
trans-unit.target: --custom-header ：提供CSV文件的自定义标题行

trans-unit.source: --daemon: daemonize this rethinkdb process
trans-unit.target: --daemon ：守护这个rethinkdb进程

trans-unit.source: --direct-io: use direct I/O for file access
trans-unit.target: --direct-io ：使用直接I / O进行文件访问

trans-unit.source: --directory—use a different data directory so the two nodes don’t try to access the same files.
trans-unit.target: --directory —使用不同的数据目录，以便两个节点不要尝试访问相同的文件。

trans-unit.source: --driver-port port: port for RethinkDB protocol client drivers
trans-unit.target: --driver-port port ：RethinkDB协议客户端驱动程序的端口

trans-unit.source: --driver-tls-ca ca_filename: CA certificate bundle used to verify client certificates; TLS client authentication disabled if omitted
trans-unit.target: --driver-tls-ca ca_filename ：用于验证客户端证书的CA证书捆绑包；如果省略，则禁用TLS客户端身份验证

trans-unit.source: --driver-tls-cert cert_filename: certificate to use for client driver connection TLS
trans-unit.target: --driver-tls-cert cert_filename ：用于客户端驱动程序连接TLS的证书

trans-unit.source: --driver-tls-key key_filename: private key to use for client driver connection TLS
trans-unit.target: --driver-tls-key key_filename ：用于客户端驱动程序连接TLS的私钥

trans-unit.source: --fields: only import from the listed fields
trans-unit.target: --fields ：仅从列出的字段导入

trans-unit.source: --force: import data even if a table already exists
trans-unit.target: --force ：即使表已经存在也导入数据

trans-unit.source: --format: CSV or JSON (default JSON)
trans-unit.target: --format ：CSV或JSON（默认JSON）

trans-unit.source: --hard-durability: use hard durability writes (slower, but less memory consumption on the server)
trans-unit.target: --hard-durability ：使用硬性持久性写入（速度较慢，但​​服务器上的内存消耗较少）

trans-unit.source: --http-port port: port for web administration console
trans-unit.target: --http-port port ：Web管理控制台的端口

trans-unit.source: --http-tls-cert cert_filename: certificate to use for web administration console TLS
trans-unit.target: --http-tls-cert cert_filename ：用于Web管理控制台TLS的证书

trans-unit.source: --http-tls-key key_filename: private key to use for web administration console TLS
trans-unit.target: --http-tls-key key_filename ：用于Web管理控制台TLS的私钥

trans-unit.source: --initial-password: set a password for the admin user if none has previously been set; use auto to choose a random password that will be printed to stdout (see Secure your cluster for more information)
trans-unit.target: --initial-password ：如果以前没有设置 admin 用户的密码，请设置密码；使用 auto 选择一个随机密码，该密码将 stdout 到stdout（有关更多信息，请参阅保护群集）

trans-unit.source: --io-threads n: how many simultaneous I/O operations can happen at the same time
trans-unit.target: --io-threads n ：可以同时发生多少个同时的I​​ / O操作

trans-unit.source: --join—tell our new RethinkDB instance to connect to another instance (in this case, localhost:29015).
trans-unit.target: --join —告诉我们新的RethinkDB实例以连接到另一个实例（在本例中为 localhost:29015 ）。

trans-unit.source: --log-file file: specify the file to log to, defaults to ‘log_file’
trans-unit.target: --log-file file ：指定要登录的文件，默认为“ log_file”

trans-unit.source: --no-default-bind: disable automatic listening on loopback addresses, unless explicitly specified in a separate --bind option
trans-unit.target: --no-default-bind ：禁用对回送地址的自动侦听，除非在单独的 --bind 选项中明确指定

trans-unit.source: --no-header: indicate the first line of a CSV file is not a header row
trans-unit.target: --no-header ：表示CSV文件的第一行不是标题行

trans-unit.source: --no-http-admin: disable web administration console
trans-unit.target: --no-http-admin ：禁用Web管理控制台

trans-unit.source: --no-secondary-indexes: do not create secondary indexes for the restored tables
trans-unit.target: --no-secondary-indexes ：不为已还原的表创建二级索引

trans-unit.source: --no-update-check: disable checking for available updates. Also turns off anonymous usage data collection.
trans-unit.target: --no-update-check ：禁用检查可用更新。同时关闭匿名使用情况数据收集。

trans-unit.source: --password-file: read the admin password from a plain text file
trans-unit.target: --password-file ：从纯文本文件中读取管理员密码

trans-unit.source: --pid-file path: a file in which to write the process id when the process is running
trans-unit.target: --pid-file path ：运行进程时在其中写入进程ID的文件

trans-unit.source: --port-offset—increment all ports by 1 so the two nodes don’t try to use the same ports on one machine.
trans-unit.target: --port-offset —将所有端口增加1，这样两个节点就不会尝试在一台计算机上使用相同的端口。

trans-unit.source: --reql-http-proxy [protocol://]host[:port]: HTTP proxy to use for performing r.http(...) queries, default port is 1080
trans-unit.target: --reql-http-proxy [protocol://]host[:port] ：用于执行 r.http(...) 查询的HTTP代理，默认端口为1080

trans-unit.source: --rungroup group: run with the specified group
trans-unit.target: --rungroup group ：使用指定的组运行

trans-unit.source: --runuser user: run as the specified user
trans-unit.target: --runuser user ：以指定用户身份运行

trans-unit.source: --table: table to import to
trans-unit.target: --table ：要导入的表

trans-unit.source: --temp-dir: directory to use for intermediary results
trans-unit.target: --temp-dir ：用于中间结果的目录

trans-unit.source: --tls-cert: specify a path to a TLS certificate to allow encrypted connections to the server (see Securing the cluster)
trans-unit.target: --tls-cert ：指定TLS证书的路径，以允许与服务器的加密连接（请参阅保护群集）

trans-unit.source: --tls-ciphers cipher_list: specify a list of TLS ciphers to use; default is EECDH+AESGCM
trans-unit.target: --tls-ciphers cipher_list ：指定要使用的TLS密码列表; 默认为 EECDH+AESGCM

trans-unit.source: --tls-dhparams dhparams_filename: provide parameters for DHE key agreement; REQUIRED if using DHE cipher suites; at least 2048-bit recommended
trans-unit.target: --tls-dhparams dhparams_filename ：提供DHE密钥协议的参数; 如果使用DHE密码套件，则为必填；建议至少2048位

trans-unit.source: --tls-ecdh-curve curve_name: specify a named elliptic curve to use for ECDHE; default is prime256v1
trans-unit.target: --tls-ecdh-curve curve_name ：指定用于ECDHE的命名椭圆曲线; 默认为 prime256v1

trans-unit.source: --tls-min-protocol protocol: the minimum TLS protocol version the server accepts, one of TLSv1, TLSv1.1, TLSv1.2; default is TLSv1.2
trans-unit.target: --tls-min-protocol protocol ：服务器接受的最低TLS协议版本， TLSv1 ， TLSv1.1 ， TLSv1.2 之一；默认为 TLSv1.2

trans-unit.source: --web-static-directory directory: the directory containing web resources for the http interface
trans-unit.target: --web-static-directory directory ：包含用于http界面的Web资源的目录

trans-unit.source: -1: no limit
trans-unit.target: -1 ：无限制

trans-unit.source: -c [ --cores ] n: the number of cores to use
trans-unit.target: -c [ --cores ] n ：要使用的内核数

trans-unit.source: -c, --connect: host and client port of the node to connect to (default: localhost:28015)
trans-unit.target: -c ，-- --connect ：要连接的节点的主机和客户端端口（默认值： localhost:28015 ）

trans-unit.source: -c: connect to the given IP address/host and port
trans-unit.target: -c ：连接到给定的IP地址/主机和端口

trans-unit.source: -d [ --directory ] path: specify directory to store data and metadata
trans-unit.target: -d [ --directory ] path ：指定用于存储数据和元数据的目录

trans-unit.source: -e, --export: limit the dump to the given database or table (specified as database.table); may be specified multiple times for multiple databases/tables
trans-unit.target: -e ，-- --export ：将转储限制为给定的数据库或表（指定为 database.table ）；可以为多个数据库/表多次指定

trans-unit.source: -f, --file: specify a filename for the archive (default: rethinkdb_dump_<date>_<time>.tar.gz)
trans-unit.target: -f ， --file ：指定归档的文件名（默认值： rethinkdb_dump_<date>_<time>.tar.gz ）

trans-unit.source: -f: file to import from
trans-unit.target: -f ：要从中导入的文件

trans-unit.source: -h [ --help ]: print this help
trans-unit.target: -h [ --help ] ：打印此帮助

trans-unit.source: -h, --help: print help
trans-unit.target: -h ， --help ：打印帮助

trans-unit.source: -i, --import: limit the restore to the given database or table (specified as database.table); may be specified multiple times for multiple databases/tables
trans-unit.target: -i ，-- --import ：将还原限制为给定的数据库或表（指定为 database.table ）；可以为多个数据库/表多次指定

trans-unit.source: -j [ --join ] host:port: host and port of a RethinkDB node to connect to
trans-unit.target: -j [ --join ] host:port ：连接到RethinkDB节点的主机和端口

trans-unit.source: -n [ --server-name ] arg: the name for this server (as will appear in the metadata). If not specified, it will be randomly chosen from a short list of names.
trans-unit.target: -n [ --server-name ] arg ：此服务器的名称（将出现在元数据中）。如果未指定，它将从简短的名称列表中随机选择。

trans-unit.source: -o [ --port-offset ] offset: all ports used locally will have this value added
trans-unit.target: -o [ --port-offset ] offset ：本地使用的所有端口都将添加此值

trans-unit.source: -p, --password: prompt for the admin password, if one has been set
trans-unit.target: -p ， --password ：提示输入管理员密码，如果已经设置

trans-unit.source: -t [ --server-tag ] arg: a tag for this server. Can be specified multiple times.
trans-unit.target: -t [ --server-tag ] arg ：此服务器的标签。可以多次指定。

trans-unit.source: -v [ --version ]: print the version number of rethinkdb
trans-unit.target: -v [ --version ] ：打印rethinkdb的版本号

trans-unit.source: 0: no requests will be made, an empty stream will be returned
trans-unit.target: 0 ：没有请求，将返回空流

trans-unit.source: 16CLIENT_ERROR: The server failed to run the query due to a bad client request. The error message will be in the first element of r.
trans-unit.target: 16 CLIENT_ERROR ：由于客户端请求错误，服务器无法运行查询。错误消息将在 r 的第一个元素中。

trans-unit.source: 17COMPILE_ERROR: The server failed to run the query due to an ReQL compilation error. The error message will be in the first element of r.
trans-unit.target: 17 COMPILE_ERROR ：由于ReQL编译错误，服务器无法运行查询。错误消息将在 r 的第一个元素中。

trans-unit.source: 18RUNTIME_ERROR: The query compiled correctly, but failed at runtime. The error message will be in the first element of r.
trans-unit.target: 18 RUNTIME_ERROR ：查询已正确编译，但在运行时失败。错误消息将在 r 的第一个元素中。

trans-unit.source: 1SEQUENCE_FEED: The stream is a changefeed.
trans-unit.target: 1 SEQUENCE_FEED ：流是变更提要。

trans-unit.source: 1START: Start a new query.
trans-unit.target: 1 START ：开始一个新的查询。

trans-unit.source: 1SUCCESS_ATOM: The whole query has been returned and the result is in the first (and only) element of r.
trans-unit.target: 1 SUCCESS_ATOM ：已返回整个查询，并且结果在 r 的第一个（也是唯一的）元素中。

trans-unit.source: 2ATOM_FEED: The stream is a point changefeed, i.e., returning changes from a single document.
trans-unit.target: 2 ATOM_FEED ：流是一个点变更提要，即从单个文档返回变更。

trans-unit.source: 2CONTINUE: Continue a query that returned SUCCESS_PARTIAL (see Receive responses).
trans-unit.target: 2 CONTINUE ：继续返回 SUCCESS_PARTIAL 的查询（请参阅接收响应）。

trans-unit.source: 2SUCCESS_SEQUENCE: Either the whole query has been returned in r, or the last section of a multi-response query has been returned.
trans-unit.target: 2 SUCCESS_SEQUENCE ：要么在 r 中返回了整个查询，要么返回了多响应查询的最后一部分。

trans-unit.source: 3000 can be changed to any port that is available on your local server.
trans-unit.target: 3000 可以将3000更改为本地服务器上可用的任何端口。

trans-unit.source: 3ORDER_BY_LIMIT_FEED: The stream is a changefeed generated with an order_by().limit() query.
trans-unit.target: 3 ORDER_BY_LIMIT_FEED ：流是使用 order_by().limit() 查询生成的变更提要。

trans-unit.source: 3STOP: Stop a query that is still executing.
trans-unit.target: 3 STOP ：停止仍在执行的查询。

trans-unit.source: 3SUCCESS_PARTIAL: The query has returned a stream, which may or may not be complete. To retrieve more results for the query, send a CONTINUE message (see below).
trans-unit.target: 3 SUCCESS_PARTIAL ：查询返回了一个流，该流可能是完整的也可能是不完整的。要检索更多查询结果，请发送一条 CONTINUE 消息（请参见下文）。

trans-unit.source: 4NOREPLY_WAIT: Wait for noreply operations to finish. The server will return a WAIT_COMPLETE response.
trans-unit.target: 4 NOREPLY_WAIT ：等待noreply操作完成。服务器将返回 WAIT_COMPLETE 响应。

trans-unit.source: 4UNIONED_FEED: The stream is a union of multiple changefeed types that cannot be collapsed to a single type, e.g., r.table('test').changes().union(r.table('test').get(0).changes()).
trans-unit.target: 4 UNIONED_FEED ：流是多个不能合并为单个类型的 r.table('test').changes().union(r.table('test').get(0).changes()) 类型的并集，例如r.table（'test'）。changes（）。union（r.table（'test'）。get（0） ）.changes（））。

trans-unit.source: 4WAIT_COMPLETE: This ResponseType indicates all queries run in noreply mode have finished executing. r will be empty.
trans-unit.target: 4 WAIT_COMPLETE ：此 ResponseType 表示以 noreply 模式运行的所有查询已完成执行。 r 将为空。

trans-unit.source: 5INCLUDES_STATES: The stream is a changefeed that includes states notes, e.g., `{state: ‘initializing’}.
trans-unit.target: 5 INCLUDES_STATES ：流是一个变更提要，其中包含状态注释，例如`{state：'initializing'}。

trans-unit.source: 5SERVER_INFO: Ask for server information. The server will return a SERVER_INFO response.
trans-unit.target: 5 SERVER_INFO ：询问服务器信息。服务器将返回 SERVER_INFO 响应。

trans-unit.source: 5SERVER_INFO: The response to a SERVER_INFO request. The data will be in the first (and only) element of r.
trans-unit.target: 5 SERVER_INFO ：对 SERVER_INFO 请求的响应。数据将在 r 的第一个（也是唯一的）元素中。

trans-unit.source: CONTINUE and STOP should be sent on the same connection with the same token generated for that query’s START message.
trans-unit.target: CONTINUE 和 STOP 应该在同一连接上发送，并为该查询的 START 消息生成相同的令牌。

trans-unit.source: HOST is the ip of any server on your RethinkDB cluster.
trans-unit.target: HOST 是RethinkDB群集上任何服务器的IP。

trans-unit.source: ReqlAuthError: the client failed authentication with the server. This is a subclass of ReqlDriverError.
trans-unit.target: ReqlAuthError ：客户端与服务器的身份验证失败。这是 ReqlDriverError 的子类。

trans-unit.source: ReqlAvailabilityError: the parent class of ReqlOpFailedError and ReqlOpIndeterminateError, indicating that a server in the cluster is unavailable. Programs may use this to catch any availability error, but the server will always return one of this class’s children.
trans-unit.target: ReqlAvailabilityError ： ReqlOpFailedError 和 ReqlOpIndeterminateError 的父类，指示集群中的服务器不可用。程序可以使用它来捕获任何可用性错误，但是服务器将始终返回此类的子级之一。

trans-unit.source: ReqlCompileError: the query cannot be compiled by the server. This may be due to a syntax error, such as an unrecognized optional argument, or specifying the wrong number of arguments to a command. Note: Some drivers may catch certain syntax errors and return a ReqlDriverError before sending the query to the server.
trans-unit.target: ReqlCompileError ：服务器无法编译查询。这可能是由于语法错误（例如，无法识别的可选参数）或为命令指定了错误的参数数量所致。注意：在将查询发送到服务器之前，某些驱动程序可能会捕获某些语法错误并返回 ReqlDriverError 。

trans-unit.source: ReqlDriverError: an error has occurred within the driver. This may be a driver bug, or it may be an unfulfillable command, such as an unserializable query.
trans-unit.target: ReqlDriverError ：驱动程序内发生错误。这可能是驱动程序错误，也可能是无法执行的命令，例如无法序列化的查询。

trans-unit.source: ReqlInternalError: query execution stopped due to an internal error, i.e., a server bug.
trans-unit.target: ReqlInternalError ：由于内部错误（例如服务器错误）而停止了查询执行。

trans-unit.source: ReqlNonExistenceError: a ReqlQueryLogicError that results from accessing a non-existent field or something else that can be handled with the default command.
trans-unit.target: ReqlNonExistenceError ： ReqlQueryLogicError ，它是由于访问不存在的字段或可以使用默认命令处理的其他内容而导致的。

trans-unit.source: ReqlOpFailedError: the operation has failed due to cluster state, configuration or table availability.
trans-unit.target: ReqlOpFailedError ：由于集群状态，配置或表可用性，操作失败。

trans-unit.source: ReqlOpIndeterminateError: the status of the operation cannot be verified due to cluster state, configuration or table availability.
trans-unit.target: ReqlOpIndeterminateError ：由于集群状态，配置或表可用性，无法验证操作的状态。

trans-unit.source: ReqlPermissionsError: the user account does not have the permissions necessary to execute the query. See Permissions and user accounts for more information.
trans-unit.target: ReqlPermissionsError ：用户帐户没有执行查询所需的权限。有关更多信息，请参见权限和用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: ReqlQueryLogicError: the query contains a logical impossibility, such as adding a number to a string.
trans-unit.target: ReqlQueryLogicError ：查询包含逻辑上的不可能，例如在字符串中添加数字。

trans-unit.source: ReqlResourceLimitError: query execution caused a resource limit (for example, the array size limit) to be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: ReqlResourceLimitError ：查询执行导致超出资源限制（例如，数组大小限制）。

trans-unit.source: ReqlRuntimeError: the parent class of all runtime errors (all errors on the server unrelated to compilation). Programs may use this to catch any runtime error, but the server will always return a more specific error class.
trans-unit.target: ReqlRuntimeError ：所有运行时错误（服务器上与编译无关的所有错误）的父类。程序可以使用它来捕获任何运行时错误，但是服务器将始终返回更具体的错误类。

trans-unit.source: ReqlTimeoutError: the query has timed out. (This error happens on the client, not the server. Depending on driver implementation it may derive from a native error class rather than ReqlError.)
trans-unit.target: ReqlTimeoutError ：查询已超时。（此错误发生在客户端上，而不是服务器上。根据驱动程序的实现，它可能源自本地错误类，而不是 ReqlError 。）

trans-unit.source: ReqlUserError: an error produced by the error command.
trans-unit.target: ReqlUserError ：错误命令产生的错误。

trans-unit.source: add: a new value added to the result set.

trans-unit.source: arrayLimit: the maximum numbers of array elements that can be returned by a query (default: 100,000). This affects all ReQL commands that return arrays. Note that it has no effect on the size of arrays being written to the database; those always have an upper limit of 100,000 elements.
trans-unit.target: arrayLimit ：查询可以返回的数组元素的最大数量（默认值：100,000）。这会影响所有返回数组的ReQL命令。请注意，它对写入数据库的数组大小没有影响。那些元素的上限始终为100,000。

trans-unit.target: attempts ：连接失败后重试的次数（默认为 5 ）。

trans-unit.source: backfilling: the server is receiving data from another server.

trans-unit.source: connected_to: a key/value list of servers this server is either currently connected to (true), or knows about but is not currently connected to (false). In most cases other servers will be identified by name, but if the server being queried cannot determine the name of a server in the cluster it is not connected to, it will be identified by UUID.
trans-unit.target: connected_to ：该服务器当前连接到（ true ）或知道但当前未连接到（ false ）的服务器的键/值列表。在大多数情况下，其他服务器将通过名称进行标识，但是如果查询的服务器无法确定未连接的集群中服务器的名称，则将通过UUID进行标识。

trans-unit.target: critical ：如果问题可能导致可用性下降，则为 true 。

trans-unit.source: current_issues is a read-only table that returns statistics about cluster problems. For details, read the System current issues table documentation.
trans-unit.target: current_issues 是一个只读表，该表返回有关群集问题的统计信息。有关详细信息，请阅读“ 系统当前问题”表文档。

trans-unit.source: data: Data to send to the server on a POST, PUT, PATCH, or DELETE request. For POST requests, data may be either an object (which will be written to the body as form-encoded key/value pairs) or a string; for all other requests, data will be serialized as JSON and placed in the request body, sent as Content-Type: application/json. Default: no data will be sent.
trans-unit.target: data ：根据 POST ， PUT ， PATCH 或 DELETE 请求发送到服务器的数据。对于 POST 请求，数据可以是一个对象（将作为形式编码的键/值对写入到主体）或字符串。对于所有其他请求，数据将序列化为JSON并放置在请求正文中，并以 Content-Type: application/json 。默认值：不发送任何数据。

trans-unit.source: durability: hard
trans-unit.target: durability ： hard

trans-unit.source: durability: soft or hard (the default). In hard durability mode, writes are committed to disk before acknowledgements are sent; in soft mode, writes are acknowledged immediately upon receipt. The soft mode is faster but slightly less resilient to failure.
trans-unit.target: durability ： soft 或 hard （默认）。在 hard 持久性模式下，在发送确认之前将写操作提交到磁盘。在 soft 模式下，接收到写入后立即确认写入。该 soft 模式是快，但稍显不足的弹性要失败的。

trans-unit.source: durability: if set to soft, writes will be acknowledged by the server immediately and flushed to disk in the background. The default is hard: acknowledgment of writes happens after data has been written to disk.
trans-unit.target: durability ：如果设置为 soft ，服务器将立即确认写入，并在后台将其刷新到磁盘。默认值为 hard ：写入确认发生在将数据写入磁盘后。

trans-unit.source: durability: possible values are 'hard' and 'soft'. In soft durability mode RethinkDB will acknowledge the write immediately after receiving it, but before the write has been committed to disk.
trans-unit.target: durability ：可能的值为 'hard' 和 'soft' 。在软持久性模式下，RethinkDB将在接收到写入之后但在将写入提交到磁盘之前立即确认写入。

trans-unit.source: durability: possible values are hard and soft. This option will override the table or query’s durability setting (set in run).
trans-unit.target: durability ：可能的值是 hard 还是 soft 。此选项将覆盖表或查询的持久性设置（在run中设置）。

trans-unit.source: durability: possible values are hard and soft. This option will override the table or query’s durability setting (set in run). In soft durability mode RethinkDB will acknowledge the write immediately after receiving and caching it, but before the write has been committed to disk.
trans-unit.target: durability ：可能的值是 hard 还是 soft 。此选项将覆盖表或查询的持久性设置（在run中设置）。在软持久性模式下，RethinkDB将在接收并缓存该写入之后但在将写入提交到磁盘之前立即确认该写入。

trans-unit.source: durability: possible values are hard and soft. This option will override the table or query’s durability setting (set in run). In soft durability mode RethinkDB will acknowledge the write immediately after receiving it, but before the write has been committed to disk.
trans-unit.target: durability ：可能的值是 hard 还是 soft 。此选项将覆盖表或查询的持久性设置（在run中设置）。在软持久性模式下，RethinkDB将在接收到写入之后但在将写入提交到磁盘之前立即确认写入。

trans-unit.source: false: All changes will be sent to the client verbatim. This is the default.

trans-unit.source: firstBatchScaledownFactor: factor to scale the other parameters down by on the first batch (default: 4). For example, with this set to 8 and maxBatchRows set to 80, on the first batch maxBatchRows will be adjusted to 10 (80 / 8). This allows the first batch to return faster.
trans-unit.target: firstBatchScaledownFactor ：第一个批次时按比例缩小其他参数的因子（默认值：4）。例如，将其设置为8并将 maxBatchRows 设置为80，则在第一批 maxBatchRows 将被调整为10（80/8）。这样可以使第一批退货更快。

trans-unit.source: first_error – If errors is positive, the text of the first error message encountered will be in this field. This is a very useful debugging aid. (We don’t return all of the errors because a single typo can result in millions of errors when operating on a large database.)
trans-unit.target: first_error –如果 errors 是肯定的，则遇到的第一条错误消息的文本将在此字段中。这是非常有用的调试工具。（我们不会返回所有错误，因为在大型数据库上进行操作时，一次输入错误可能会导致数百万个错误。）

trans-unit.source: first_error: If errors were encountered, contains the text of the first error.

trans-unit.target: groups ：用括号定义的捕获组

trans-unit.target: id ：一到三个项目的列表，指示用户和给定权限的范围，这些项目是用户名，数据库UUID（用于数据库和表范围）和表UUID（仅用于表范围）。

trans-unit.target: identifierFormat ：可能的值为 name 和 uuid ，默认值为 name 。如果设置为 uuid ，那么系统表将通过UUID而不是名称来引用服务器，数据库和表。（这仅在与系统表一起使用时才有效。）

trans-unit.source: ignoreWriteHook: If true, and if the user has the config permission, ignores any write hook when performing the replacement.
trans-unit.target: ignoreWriteHook ：如果为 true ，并且用户具有配置权限，则在执行替换时将忽略任何写钩子。

trans-unit.source: ignoreWriteHook: If true, and if the user has the config permission, ignores any write hook when performing the update.
trans-unit.target: ignoreWriteHook ：如果为 true ，并且用户具有配置权限，则在执行更新时将忽略任何写钩子。

trans-unit.source: includeInitial: if true, the changefeed stream will begin with the current contents of the table or selection being monitored. These initial results will have new_val fields, but no old_val fields. The initial results may be intermixed with actual changes, as long as an initial result for the changed document has already been given. If an initial result for a document has been sent and a change is made to that document that would move it to the unsent part of the result set (e.g., a changefeed monitors the top 100 posters, the first 50 have been sent, and poster 48 has become poster 52), an “uninitial” notification will be sent, with an old_val field but no new_val field.
trans-unit.target: includeInitial ：如果为 true ，那么changefeed流将从表或被监视的当前内容的内容开始。这些初始结果将具有 new_val 字段，但没有 old_val 字段。初始结果可以与实际更改混合，只要已给出更改文档的初始结果即可。如果已发送文档的初始结果，并且对该文档进行了更改，将其移动到结果集的未发送部分（例如，changefeed监视前100个发布者，则前50个已经发送，发布者48已成为海报52），将发送“ uninitial”通知，其中包含 old_val 字段，但没有 new_val 字段。

trans-unit.source: includeOffsets: if true, a changefeed stream on an orderBy.limit changefeed will include old_offset and new_offset fields in status documents that include old_val and new_val. This allows applications to maintain ordered lists of the stream’s result set. If old_offset is set and not null, the element at old_offset is being deleted; if new_offset is set and not null, then new_val is being inserted at new_offset. Setting includeOffsets to true on a changefeed that does not support it will raise an error.
trans-unit.target: includeOffsets ：如果为 true ，则orderBy.limit changefeed上的 orderBy.limit 流将在状态文件中包括 old_val 和 new_val 的 old_offset 和 new_offset 字段。这使应用程序可以维护流结果集的有序列表。如果设置了 old_offset 并且不为 null ，那么将删除 old_offset 处的元素；否则，将删除该元素。如果 new_offset 是一套，而不是 null ，然后 new_val 被插入在 new_offset 。将 includeOffsets 设置为 true 在不支持它的changefeed上将引发错误。

trans-unit.source: includeStates: if true, the changefeed stream will include special status documents consisting of the field state and a string indicating a change in the feed’s state. These documents can occur at any point in the feed between the notification documents described below. If includeStates is false (the default), the status documents will not be sent.
trans-unit.target: includeStates ：如果为 true ，则changefeed流将包括特殊的状态文档，该文档由字段 state 和指示Feed状态更改的字符串组成。这些文档可以出现在下面所述的通知文档之间的源中的任何位置。如果 includeStates 为 false （默认设置），则不会发送状态文档。

trans-unit.source: includeTypes: if true, every result on a changefeed will include a type field with a string that indicates the kind of change the result represents: add, remove, change, initial, uninitial, state. Defaults to false.
trans-unit.target: includeTypes ：如果为 true ，则changefeed上的每个结果都将包含一个 type 字段，该字段带有字符串，该字符串指示结果表示的更改类型： add ， remove ， change ， initial ， uninitial ， state 。默认为 false 。

trans-unit.source: inserted – Number of new documents added to the database.

trans-unit.target: inserted ， replaced 和 unchanged ：全部为0的删除操作。

trans-unit.source: no-http-admin: Disable web administration console.
trans-unit.target: no-http-admin ：禁用Web管理控制台。

trans-unit.source: nonAtomic: if set to true, executes the replacement and distributes the result to replicas in a non-atomic fashion. This flag is required to perform non-deterministic updates, such as those that require reading data from another table.
trans-unit.target: nonAtomic ：如果设置为 true ，则执行替换并将结果以非原子方式分发到副本。需要使用该标志来执行非确定性更新，例如那些需要从另一个表中读取数据的更新。

trans-unit.source: nonAtomic: if set to true, executes the update and distributes the result to replicas in a non-atomic fashion. This flag is required to perform non-deterministic updates, such as those that require reading data from another table.
trans-unit.target: nonAtomic ：如果设置为 true ，则执行更新并将结果以非原子方式分发给副本。需要使用该标志来执行非确定性更新，例如那些需要从另一个表中读取数据的更新。

trans-unit.source: nonvotingReplicaTags: replicas with these server tags will be added to the nonvoting_replicas list of the resulting configuration. (See failover for details about non-voting replicas.)
trans-unit.target: nonvotingReplicaTags ：具有这些服务器标签的副本将添加到结果配置的 nonvoting_replicas 列表中。（有关无表决副本的详细信息，请参见故障转移。）

trans-unit.source: nonvoting_replicas: a list of servers which do not participate in “voting” as part of failover. If this field is omitted, it is treated as an empty list. This list must be a subset of the replicas field and must not contain the primary replica.
trans-unit.target: nonvoting_replicas ：不作为故障转移的一部分参与“投票”的服务器列表。如果省略此字段，则将其视为空列表。此列表必须是 replicas 字段的子集，并且不能包含主副本。

trans-unit.source: noreply: set to true to not receive the result object or cursor and return immediately.
trans-unit.target: noreply ：设置为 true 以不接收结果对象或游标并立即返回。

trans-unit.source: noreplyWait ensures that previous queries with the noreply flag have been processed by the server. Note that this guarantee only applies to queries run on the given connection.
trans-unit.target: noreplyWait 确保服务器已处理带有 noreply 标志的先前查询。请注意，此保证仅适用于在给定连接上运行的查询。

trans-unit.source: not can be called either via method chaining, immediately after an expression that evaluates as a boolean value, or by passing the expression as a parameter to not. All values that are not false or null will be converted to true.
trans-unit.target: not 可以通过方法链，在以布尔值计算的表达式之后立即调用not，也可以通过将表达式作为参数传递给 not 来调用not。所有非 false 或 null 的值都将转换为 true 。

trans-unit.source: numVertices: the number of vertices in the polygon or line. Defaults to 32.
trans-unit.target: numVertices ：多边形或直线中的顶点数。默认为32

trans-unit.source: old_val: The table’s config value before reconfigure was executed.
trans-unit.target: old_val ：执行 reconfigure 配置之前，表的配置值。

trans-unit.source: old_val: The table’s status value before rebalance was executed.
trans-unit.target: old_val ：执行 rebalance 之前，表的状态值。

trans-unit.source: old_val: The table’s status value before reconfigure was executed.
trans-unit.target: old_val ：执行 reconfigure 之前，表的状态值。

trans-unit.source: old_val: always null.
trans-unit.target: old_val ：始终为 null 。

trans-unit.source: old_val: the database’s original config value.
trans-unit.target: old_val ：数据库的原始配置值。

trans-unit.source: old_val: the dropped table’s config value.

trans-unit.source: on_change: changes will be passed to this method.
trans-unit.target: on_change ：更改将传递给此方法。

trans-unit.source: on_change_error: if the feed includes a document specifying errors that do not cause the feed to abort (for instance, a notification the server discarded some changes), those errors will be passed to this method.
trans-unit.target: on_change_error ：如果提要中包含指定不会导致提要中止的错误的文档（例如，服务器放弃了一些更改的通知），则这些错误将传递给此方法。

trans-unit.source: on_initial_val: if the changefeed returns initial values (include_initial has been specified as an option to changes, those values will be passed to this method.
trans-unit.target: on_initial_val ：如果changefeed返回初始值（ include_initial 已指定为changes选项，则这些值将传递给此方法。

trans-unit.source: on_state: a feed may include documents specifying the state of the stream; those documents will be passed to this function if defined.
trans-unit.target: on_state ：提要可能包含指定流状态的文档；这些文件将在定义后传递给该函数。

trans-unit.source: on_uninitial_val: a changefeed that returns initial values may also return “uninitial” values to indicate a document already sent as an initial value has been changed (see the changes documentation for details); those values, if any, will be passed to this method.
trans-unit.target: on_uninitial_val ：返回初始值的changefeed也可能返回“ uninitial”值，以指示由于初始值已被更改而已发送的文档（有关详细信息，请参见 changes 文档）；这些值（如果有）将传递给此方法。

trans-unit.source: orderBy must be used with a secondary index or the primary index; it cannot be used with an unindexed field.
trans-unit.target: orderBy 必须与二级索引或一级索引一起使用；它不能与未索引字段一起使用。

trans-unit.source: orderBy requires limit; neither command works by itself.
trans-unit.target: orderBy 需要 limit ; 这两个命令本身都不起作用。

trans-unit.source: order_by (with or without indexes)
trans-unit.target: order_by （有或没有索引）

trans-unit.source: order_bywith indexes
trans-unit.target: order_by 带索引的order_by

trans-unit.target: outdated 将返回在任意选择的副本上的内存中的值。这是最快但最不稳定的。

trans-unit.source: p: a profile if the global optarg profile: true was specified; this field will not be present otherwise
trans-unit.target: p ：如果指定了全局optarg profile: true ，则为配置文件；否则该字段将不存在

trans-unit.source: page: This option may specify either a built-in pagination strategy (see below), or a function to provide the next URL and/or params to request.
trans-unit.target: page ：此选项可以指定内置的分页策略（请参见下文）或提供下一个要请求的URL和/或 params 的函数。

trans-unit.source: pageLimit: An integer specifying the maximum number of requests to issue using the page functionality. This is to prevent overuse of API quotas, and must be specified with page.
trans-unit.target: pageLimit ：一个整数，指定使用 page 功能发出的最大请求数。这是为了防止过度使用API​​配额，并且必须与 page 一起指定。

trans-unit.source: params: object specifying URL parameters to append to the URL as encoded key/value pairs. { query: 'banana', limit: 2 } will be appended as ?query=banana&limit=2. Default: no parameters.
trans-unit.target: params ：指定URL参数的对象，该URL参数作为编码的键/值对附加到URL。 { query: 'banana', limit: 2 } 将附加为 ?query=banana&limit=2 。默认值：无参数。

trans-unit.source: params: object specifying URL parameters to append to the URL as encoded key/value pairs. {query:'banana',limit:2} will be appended as ?query=banana&limit=2. Default: no parameters.
trans-unit.target: params ：指定URL参数的对象，这些参数将作为编码的键/值对附加到URL。 {query:'banana',limit:2} 将附加为 ?query=banana&limit=2 。默认值：无参数。

trans-unit.source: permissions stores permissions and scopes associated with RethinkDB user accounts. (See Permissions and user accounts.)

trans-unit.target: primary_replica ：充当分片主数据库的服务器的名称或UUID。如果 primary_replica 为 null ，则该表将不可用。如果删除了充当分片主服务器的服务器，则可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: primary_replicas: a list of zero or more servers acting as primary replicas for the shard. If it contains more than one server, different parts of the shard are being served by different primaries; this is a temporary condition.
trans-unit.target: primary_replicas ：零个或多个服务器的列表，这些服务器充当分片的主副本。如果它包含多个服务器，则分片的不同部分将由不同的主服务器提供服务；这是暂时的情况。

trans-unit.source: primary_replicas: a list of zero or more servers acting as primary replicas for the table.

trans-unit.source: slice returns the range between startOffset and endOffset. If only startOffset is specified, slice returns the range from that index to the end of the sequence. Specify leftBound or rightBound as open or closed to indicate whether to include that endpoint of the range by default: closed returns that endpoint, while open does not. By default, leftBound is closed and rightBound is open, so the range (10,13) will return the tenth, eleventh and twelfth elements in the sequence.
trans-unit.target: slice 返回介于 startOffset 和 endOffset 之间的范围。如果仅指定 startOffset ，则 slice 将返回从该索引到序列结尾的范围。将 leftBound 或 rightBound 指定为 open 或 closed 以指示默认情况下是否包括该范围的端点： closed 返回该端点，而 open 不包含该端点。默认情况下， leftBound 是关闭的， rightBound 是打开的，因此范围 (10,13) 将返回序列中的第十，第十十一和第十二个元素。

trans-unit.source: ssl: a hash of options to support SSL connections (default null). Currently, there is only one option available, and if the ssl option is specified, this key is required:
trans-unit.target: ssl ：支持SSL连接的选项的哈希（默认为 null ）。当前，只有一个选项可用，如果指定了 ssl 选项，则需要此密钥：

trans-unit.source: start: The matched string’s start
trans-unit.target: start ：匹配的字符串的开始

trans-unit.source: state: a status document from includeStates.
trans-unit.target: state ：来自 includeStates 的状态文档。

trans-unit.source: stats is a read-only table that returns statistics about the cluster.
trans-unit.target: stats 是一个只读表，可返回有关集群的统计信息。

trans-unit.source: status: the subfields in this field indicate whether all shards of the table are ready to accept the given type of query: outdated_reads, reads and writes. The all_replicas_ready field indicates whether all backfills have finished.
trans-unit.target: status ：此字段中的子字段指示表的所有分片是否已准备就绪，可以接受给定类型的查询： outdated_reads ， reads 和 writes 。该 all_replicas_ready 字段表示所有回填是否已经完成。

trans-unit.source: status_changes: a list of new and old table status values. Each element of the list will be an object with two fields:
trans-unit.target: status_changes ：新旧表状态值的列表。列表的每个元素将是一个具有两个字段的对象：

trans-unit.source: str: The matched string
trans-unit.target: str ：匹配的字符串

trans-unit.source: sync ensures that writes on a given table are written to permanent storage. Queries that specify soft durability ({durability: 'soft'}) do not give such guarantees, so sync can be used to ensure the state of these queries. A call to sync does not return until all previous writes to the table are persisted.
trans-unit.target: sync 确保将给定表上的写操作写入永久存储。指定软耐用性（ {durability: 'soft'} ）的查询不提供此类保证，因此可以使用 sync 来确保这些查询的状态。直到对表的所有先前写入均被持久化后，对 sync 的调用才返回。

trans-unit.source: sync ensures that writes on a given table are written to permanent storage. Queries that specify soft durability ({durability:'soft'}) do not give such guarantees, so sync can be used to ensure the state of these queries. A call to sync does not return until all previous writes to the table are persisted.
trans-unit.target: sync 确保将给定表上的写操作写入永久存储。指定软耐用性（ {durability:'soft'} ）的查询不提供此类保证，因此可以使用 sync 来确保这些查询的状态。直到对表的所有先前写入都被持久化后，对 sync 的调用才返回。

trans-unit.source: t: the ResponseType, as defined in ql2.proto
trans-unit.target: t ： ResponseType ，如 ql2.proto 中所定义

trans-unit.source: table: the name of the table these permissions apply to, only present for permissions with table scope.
trans-unit.target: table ：这些权限适用于的表的名称，仅在具有表范围的权限时才显示。

trans-unit.source: table_config stores table configurations, including sharding and replication. By writing to table_config, you can create, delete, and reconfigure tables.
trans-unit.target: table_config 存储表配置，包括分片和复制。通过写入 table_config ，您可以创建，删除和重新配置表。

trans-unit.source: table_status is a read-only table which returns the status and configuration of tables in the system.
trans-unit.target: table_status 是只读表，它返回系统中表的状态和配置。

trans-unit.source: tables_created: always 1.
trans-unit.target: tables_created ：始终为 1 。

trans-unit.source: tables_dropped: always 1.
trans-unit.target: tables_dropped ：始终为 1 。

trans-unit.source: tables_dropped: the number of tables in the dropped database.
trans-unit.target: tables_dropped ：删除的数据库中的表数。

trans-unit.source: tags: a list of unordered tags associated with the server.
trans-unit.target: tags ：与服务器关联的无序标签列表。

trans-unit.source: text: always return a string.
trans-unit.target: text ：总是返回一个字符串。

trans-unit.source: timeFormat: what format to return times in (default: 'native'). Set this to 'raw' if you want times returned as JSON objects for exporting.
trans-unit.target: timeFormat ：以什么格式返回时间（默认值： 'native' ）。如果希望将时间作为JSON对象返回以进行导出，请将其设置为 'raw' 。

trans-unit.source: time_connected: the time the server connected (or reconnected) to the cluster.
trans-unit.target: time_connected ：服务器连接（或重新连接）到集群的时间。

trans-unit.source: time_started: the time the server process started.
trans-unit.target: time_started ：服务器进程启动的时间。

trans-unit.source: timeout is the number of seconds before r.js times out. The default value is 5 seconds.
trans-unit.target: timeout 是 r.js 超时之前的秒数。默认值为5秒。

trans-unit.source: timeout: a number indicating maximum time, in seconds, to wait for the table to be ready. If this value is exceeded, a ReqlRuntimeError will be thrown. A value of0 means no timeout. The default is 0 (no timeout).
trans-unit.target: timeout ：一个数字，指示等待表准备就绪的最长时间（以秒为单位）。如果超过此值，将引发 ReqlRuntimeError 。值为 0 表示没有超时。默认值为 0 （无超时）。

trans-unit.source: timeout: the underlying socket has timed out.
trans-unit.target: timeout ：基础套接字已超时。

trans-unit.source: timeout: timeout period in seconds for the connection to be opened (default 20).
trans-unit.target: timeout ：打开连接的超时时间（以秒为单位）（默认为 20 ）。

trans-unit.source: timeout: timeout period in seconds to wait before aborting the connect (default 30).
trans-unit.target: timeout ：中止连接之前要等待的超时时间（以秒为单位）（默认为 30 ）。

trans-unit.source: timestamp: a ReQL time object representing the current query execution time
trans-unit.target: timestamp ：代表当前查询执行时间的ReQL time 对象

trans-unit.source: timestamp: the time when the log message is posted.
trans-unit.target: timestamp ：发布日志消息的时间。

trans-unit.source: timezone can be 'Z' (for UTC) or a string with the format ±[hh]:[mm].
trans-unit.target: timezone 可以是 'Z' （对于UTC）或格式为 ±[hh]:[mm] 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: tls-ciphers: A list of TLS ciphers to use.
trans-unit.target: tls-ciphers ：要使用的TLS密码列表。

trans-unit.source: tls-dhparams: A filename containing parameters for DHE key agreement; this is required if using DHE cipher suites, and unused otherwise. At least a 2048-bit key is recommended.
trans-unit.target: tls-dhparams ：包含DHE密钥协商参数的文件名；如果使用DHE密码套件，则为必填项，否则为未使用。建议至少使用2048位密钥。

trans-unit.source: tls-ecdh-curve: A named elliptic curve to use for ECDHE.
trans-unit.target: tls-ecdh-curve ：用于ECDHE的命名椭圆曲线。

trans-unit.source: tls-min-protocol: the minimum TLS protocol version the server accepts, one of TLSv1, TLSv1.1, TLSv1.2.
trans-unit.target: tls-min-protocol ：服务器接受的最低TLS协议版本， TLSv1 ， TLSv1.1 和 TLSv1.2 之一。

trans-unit.source: transitioning: the server is between one of the above states. A transitioning state should typically only last a fraction of a second.
trans-unit.target: transitioning ：服务器处于上述状态之一之间。过渡状态通常应仅持续一秒钟的时间。

trans-unit.source: true: When multiple changes to the same document occur before a batch of notifications is sent, the changes are “squashed” into one change. The client receives a notification that will bring it fully up to date with the server.
trans-unit.target: true ：如果在发送一批通知之前对同一文档进行了多次更改，则这些更改将“压缩”为一个更改。客户端会收到一条通知，使它与服务器完全同步。

trans-unit.source: true: results will be mixed together; this is the fastest setting, but ordering of elements is not guaranteed. (This is the default.)
trans-unit.target: true ：结果将混合在一起；这是最快的设置，但不能保证元素的顺序。（这是默认设置。）

trans-unit.source: true: return a changes array consisting of old_val/new_val objects describing the changes made, only including the documents actually updated.
trans-unit.target: true ：返回一个由 old_val / new_val 对象组成的 changes 数组，这些对象描述所做的更改，仅包括实际更新的文档。

trans-unit.source: type: basic (default) or digest
trans-unit.target: type ： basic （默认）或 digest

trans-unit.source: type: a short string indicating the issue type. (The rest of this document goes into more detail on types.)
trans-unit.target: type ：表示问题类型的短字符串。（本文档的其余部分将详细介绍类型。）

trans-unit.source: unchanged – Number of documents that would have been modified, except that the new value was the same as the old value.
trans-unit.target: unchanged –除了新值与旧值相同外，将要修改的文档数。

trans-unit.source: unchanged: the number of documents that would have been modified except the new value was the same as the old value.
trans-unit.target: unchanged ：除新值与旧值外，将要修改的文档数。

trans-unit.source: unchanged: the number of documents that would have been modified, except that the new value was the same as the old value.
trans-unit.target: unchanged ：将被修改的文档数，除了新值与旧值相同。

trans-unit.source: unchanged: the number of documents whose fields are identical to existing documents with the same primary key when conflict is set to "replace" or "update".
trans-unit.target: unchanged ：将 conflict 设置为 "replace" 或 "update" 时，其字段与具有相同主键的现有文档相同的文档数。

trans-unit.source: uninitial: an uninitial value notification.
trans-unit.target: uninitial ：非初始值通知。

trans-unit.source: unit: Unit for the distance. Possible values are m (meter, the default), km (kilometer), mi (international mile), nm (nautical mile), ft (international foot).
trans-unit.target: unit ：距离的单位。可能的值是 m （米，默认值）， km （公里）， mi （国际英里）， nm （海里）， ft （国际英尺）。

trans-unit.source: unit: Unit for the radius distance. Possible values are m (meter, the default), km (kilometer), mi (international mile), nm (nautical mile), ft (international foot).
trans-unit.target: unit ：半径距离的单位。可能的值是 m （米，默认值）， km （公里）， mi （国际英里）， nm （海里）， ft （国际英尺）。

trans-unit.source: unit: Unit to return the distance in. Possible values are m (meter, the default), km (kilometer), mi (international mile), nm (nautical mile), ft (international foot).
trans-unit.target: unit ：返回距离的单位。可能的值是 m （米，默认值）， km （公里）， mi （国际英里）， nm （海里）， ft （国际英尺）。

trans-unit.source: unsafe_rollback: shards that are beyond repair will be left alone.
trans-unit.target: unsafe_rollback ：无法修复的碎片将被保留。

trans-unit.source: unsafe_rollback_or_erase: a shard that is beyond repair will be destroyed and recreated on an available server that holds another shard for that table.
trans-unit.target: unsafe_rollback_or_erase ：无法修复的分片将被销毁，并在容纳该表的另一个分片的可用服务器上重新创建。

trans-unit.source: uptime: how many seconds the server had been running at the time the log message was generated.
trans-unit.target: uptime ：生成日志消息时服务器已运行了几秒钟。

trans-unit.source: user: the user account to connect as (default admin).
trans-unit.target: user ：以（默认 admin ）身份连接的用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: user: username
trans-unit.target: user ：用户名

trans-unit.source: users stores RethinkDB user accounts. (See Permissions and user accounts.)
trans-unit.target: users 存储RethinkDB用户帐户。（请参阅权限和用户帐户。）

trans-unit.source: verify: if true, verify the server’s SSL certificate (default true).
trans-unit.target: verify ：如果为 true ，请验证服务器的SSL证书（默认为 true ）。

trans-unit.source: version: the version string of the RethinkDB server.
trans-unit.target: version ：RethinkDB服务器的版本字符串。

trans-unit.source: waitFor: a string indicating a table status to wait on before returning, one of ready_for_outdated_reads, ready_for_reads, ready_for_writes, or all_replicas_ready. The default is all_replicas_ready.
trans-unit.target: waitFor ：指示返回之前要等待的表状态的字符串， ready_for_outdated_reads ， ready_for_reads ， ready_for_writes 或 all_replicas_ready 之一。默认值为 all_replicas_ready 。

trans-unit.source: waiting_for_primary: the server is waiting for its primary replica to be available.
trans-unit.target: waiting_for_primary ：服务器正在等待其主副本可用。

trans-unit.source: waiting_for_quorum: the primary is waiting for a quorum of the table’s replicas to be available before it starts accepting writes.
trans-unit.target: waiting_for_quorum ：主数据库在开始接受写入之前，正在等待表副本的仲裁达到可用状态。

trans-unit.source: warnings: if the field generated_keys is truncated, you will get the warning “Too many generated keys (<X>), array truncated to 100000.”.
trans-unit.target: warnings ：如果字段 generated_keys 被截断，则会收到警告“生成的键（<X>）太多，数组被截断为100000。” 。

trans-unit.source: write allows modifying data, including inserting, replacing/updating, and deleting.
trans-unit.target: write 允许修改数据，包括插入，替换/更新和删除。

trans-unit.source: write_acks: majority
trans-unit.target: write_acks ： majority

trans-unit.source: write_acks: the write acknowledgement settings for the table. When set to majority (the default), writes will be acknowledged when a majority of replicas have acknowledged their writes; when set to single writes will be acknowledged when a single replica acknowledges it.
trans-unit.target: write_acks ：表的写入确认设置。设置为 majority （默认）时，当大多数副本已确认其写入时，将确认写入；否则，将恢复写入。当设置为 single 写时，单个副本对其进行确认时，将对其进行确认。

trans-unit.source: write_hook: the configured write hook for this table, if any. Read-only.
trans-unit.target: write_hook ：为此表配置的写钩子（如果有）。只读。

trans-unit.source: year is an integer between 1400 and 9,999.
trans-unit.target: year 是1400到9,999之间的整数。

trans-unit.source: {state: 'initializing'} indicates the following documents represent initial values on the feed rather than changes. This will be the first document of a feed that returns initial values.
trans-unit.target: {state: 'initializing'} 表示以下文档代表Feed上的初始值，而不是更改。这将是Feed中返回初始值的第一个文档。

trans-unit.source: {state: 'ready'} indicates the following documents represent changes. This will be the first document of a feed that does not return initial values; otherwise, it will indicate the initial values have all been sent.
trans-unit.target: {state: 'ready'} 表示以下文档代表更改。这将是Feed中不返回初始值的第一个文档；否则，它将指示所有初始值已发送。

trans-unit.source: {state:'initializing'} indicates the following documents represent initial values on the feed rather than changes. This will be the first document of a feed that returns initial values.
trans-unit.target: {state:'initializing'} 表示以下文档代表Feed上的初始值，而不是更改。这将是Feed中返回初始值的第一个文档。

trans-unit.source: {state:'ready'} indicates the following documents represent changes. This will be the first document of a feed that does not return initial values; otherwise, it will indicate the initial values have all been sent.
trans-unit.target: {state:'ready'} 表示以下文档代表更改。这将是Feed中不返回初始值的第一个文档；否则，它将指示所有初始值已发送。

trans-unit.target: 基于多个字段的复合索引。

trans-unit.target: 默认值： prime256v1

trans-unit.source: 1.13–1.15: Upgrade to RethinkDB 2.0.5 first, rebuild the secondary indexes by following the “Rebuild indexes” directions, then upgrade to 2.1 or higher. (Migration from 2.0.5 to 2.1+ will be handled automatically.)

trans-unit.source: 1.16 or higher: Migration is handled automatically. (This is also true for upgrading from 1.14 onward to versions earlier than 2.2.) After migration, follow the “Rebuild indexes” directions.
trans-unit.target: 1.16或更高版本：迁移是自动处理的。（从1.14升级到2.2之前的版本也是如此。）迁移后，请按照“重建索引”的说明进行操作。

trans-unit.source: All ReQL queries are chainable. You begin with a table and incrementally chain transformers to the end of the query using the . operator.
trans-unit.target: 所有ReQL查询都是可链接的。您从表格开始，然后使用递增链式转换器到查询的结尾 . 操作员。

trans-unit.source: All queries execute on the server. While queries are constructed on the client in a familiar programming language, they execute entirely on the database server once you call the run command and pass it an active database connection.
trans-unit.target: 所有查询都在服务器上执行。尽管查询是用熟悉的编程语言在客户端上构造的，但是一旦您调用 run 命令并将其传递给活动的数据库连接，它们就会完全在数据库服务器上执行。

trans-unit.source: Compatibility and Cross-platform — Fine, you may be able to query stuff in Android with the Java driver, but you may not in other platform (say, Apple’s iOS). Once again, web queries are supported by almost everything, and a simple webserver is all you need. Even Android-only apps benefit using a webserver instead of a direct connection into RethinkDB, by lowering the minimum SDK API from version 26 all the way down to version 9.
trans-unit.target: 兼容性和跨平台—很好，您可以使用Java驱动程序在Android中查询内容，但不能在其他平台（例如Apple的iOS）上查询。再一次，几乎所有内容都支持Web查询，而您只需要一个简单的Web服务器。通过将最低SDK API从版本26一直降低到版本9，即使是仅Android的应用程序也可以使用Web服务器而不是直接连接到RethinkDB，从而受益匪浅。

trans-unit.target: 基于多个字段的复合索引。

trans-unit.source: Consider using noreply mode. In this mode, the client driver will not wait for the server acknowledgement of the query before moving on to the next query. This mode is even less safe than the soft durability mode, but can result in the highest performance improvement. You can run a command in a noreply mode as follows:
trans-unit.target: 考虑使用 noreply 模式。在这种模式下，客户端驱动程序在继续下一个查询之前将不会等待服务器对查询的确认。此模式比软耐用性模式安全性更低，但是可以带来最高的性能改进。您可以按以下方式在 noreply 模式下运行命令：

trans-unit.source: Consider using soft durability mode. In soft durability mode RethinkDB will acknowledge the write immediately after receiving it, but before the write has been committed to disk. The server will use main memory to absorb the write, and will flush new data to disk in the background.
trans-unit.target: 考虑使用软耐用性模式。在软持久性模式下，RethinkDB将在接收到写入之后但在将写入提交到磁盘之前立即确认写入。服务器将使用主内存来吸收写入，并将新数据在后台刷新到磁盘。

trans-unit.source: Database security — Connecting directly though a database means your user has direct access over the database. With a decompiler, manifest extractor, or network analysis tools, you can get the database’s IP address, user, password, and it to get access to the server and exploit it. And if the permissions are not set-up or badly configured, they can wipe your database.
trans-unit.target: 数据库安全性-通过数据库直接连接意味着您的用户可以直接访问该数据库。使用反编译器，清单提取器或网络分析工具，您可以获得数据库的IP地址，用户，密码，并获得对服务器的访问权并加以利用。而且，如果未设置权限或配置错误，则它们可能会擦除数据库。

trans-unit.source: Durability is set per table with the durability setting, again using either reconfigure or writing to the table_config system table. In hard durability mode, writes are committed to disk before acknowledgements are sent; in soft mode, writes are acknowledged immediately after being stored in memory. The soft mode is faster but slightly less resilient to failure. The default is hard.
trans-unit.target: 使用持久性设置为每个表设置 durability ，再次使用 reconfigure 或写入 table_config 系统表。在 hard 持久性模式下，在发送确认之前将写操作提交到磁盘。在 soft 模式下，写入将被存储在内存中后立即被确认。该 soft 模式是快，但稍显不足的弹性要失败的。默认值为 hard 。
